entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 06:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this morning and this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
